register.name: ID
register.description: Returns a 32-bit device ID code

bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: Indicates the implementor of the processor

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Indicates the variant of the processor

bitField.name: ARM_architecture
bitField.description: Indicates the ARM architecture of the processor

bitField.name: Primary_part_number
bitField.description: Indicates the primary part number of the processor

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates the revision of the processor

register.name: TYPE
register.description: Contains information about the size and architecture of the instruction cache and data cache

bitField.name: Cache_type
bitField.description: Indicates which major cache class the implementation falls into

bitField.name: Data_cache_absent
bitField.description: Indicates if the data cache is absent

bitField.name: Data_cache_words_per_line
bitField.description: Indicates the number of words per data cache line

bitField.name: Instruction_cache_absent
bitField.description: Indicates if the instruction cache is absent

bitField.name: Instruction_cache_words_per_line
bitField.description: Indicates the number of words per instruction cache line

register.name: TCMS
register.description: Returns the size of the Instruction and Data TCM integrated with the processor

bitField.name: Data_TCM_size
bitField.description: Indicates the size of the data TCM

bitField.name: Data_TCM_absent
bitField.description: Indicates if the data TCM is absent

bitField.name: Instruction_TCM_absent
bitField.description: Indicates if the instruction TCM is absent

register.name: CONTROL
register.description: Contains the control bits of the processor

bitField.name: Instruction_TCM_load_mode
bitField.description: Controls the operation of the Instruction TCM load mode

bitField.name: Instruction_TCM_enable
bitField.description: Controls operation of the Instruction TCM

bitField.name: Data_TCM_load_mode
bitField.description: Controls the operation of the Data TCM load mode

bitField.name: Data_TCM_enable
bitField.description: Controls operation of the Data TCM

bitField.name: Disable_loading_TBIT
bitField.description: Determines if the T bit is set when load instructions change the PC

bitField.name: Alternate_vectors_select
bitField.description: controls the base address used for the exception vectors

bitField.name: Instruction_cache_enable
bitField.description: Controls the behavior of the instruction cache

bitField.name: Endian_configuration
bitField.description: Selects the endian configuration of the processor

bitField.name: Data_cache_enable
bitField.description: controls the behavior of the data cache

bitField.name: Protection_unit_enable
bitField.description: This bit controls the operation of the protection unit

register.name: DCACHEABLE
register.description: Contains the data cacheable attributes for the eight areas of memory

register.name: ICACHEABLE
register.description: Contains the instruction cacheable attributes for the eight areas of memory

register.name: BUFFERABLE
register.description: Contains the write buffer control (bufferable) attribute for the eight areas of memory

register.name: DPROTECTION
register.description: Contains the access permission bits for the data protection regions

register.name: IPROTECTION
register.description: Contains the access permission bits for the instruction protection regions

register.name: CONTEXT_ID
register.description: Enables identification of the currently executing process in multi-tasking environments

register.name: REGION7
register.description: Protection Region Base and Size for memory region 7

register.name: REGION6
register.description: Protection Region Base and Size for memory region 6

register.name: REGION5
register.description: Protection Region Base and Size for memory region 5

register.name: REGION4
register.description: Protection Region Base and Size for memory region 4

register.name: REGION3
register.description: Protection Region Base and Size for memory region 3

register.name: REGION2
register.description: Protection Region Base and Size for memory region 2

register.name: REGION1
register.description: Protection Region Base and Size for memory region 1

register.name: REGION0
register.description: Protection Region Base and Size for memory region 0

register.name: INVALIDATE_I
register.description: The value transferred in Rd Should Be Zero

register.name: INVALIDATE_I_ADDRESS
register.description: Flush instruction cache single entry

register.name: PREFETCH_I
register.description: Prefetch instruction cache line

register.name: INVALIDATE_D
register.description: The value transferred in Rd Should Be Zero

register.name: INVALIDATE_D_ADDRESS
register.description: Flush data cache single entry

register.name: CLEAN_D_ADDRESS
register.description: Clean data cache entry

register.name: CLEANINVALIDATE_D_ADDRESS
register.gui_name: Clean and flush data cache entry
register.description: Clean and flush data cache entry

register.name: CLEAN_D_INDEX
register.description: Clean data cache entry

register.name: CLEANINVALIDATE_D_INDEX
register.gui_name: Clean and flush data cache entry
register.description: Clean and flush data cache entry

register.name: DRAIN
register.description: Drain write buffer

register.name: WAIT
register.description: Wait for interrupt

register.name: D_LOCKDOWN
register.description: Enables locking of data cache regions

register.name: I_LOCKDOWN
register.description: Enables locking of instruction cache regions

register.name: DTCMR
register.description: Allows modification of the visible size of the data TCM

register.name: ITCMR
register.description: Allows modification of the visible size of the instruction TCM
